scripts.start: dotenv -e .env.development nodemon --watch src -e ts,tsx --exec ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.start:prod: dotenv -e .env.production nodemon --watch src -e ts,tsx --exec cross-env NODE_ENV=production ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.build: rm -rf build && ncc build src/index.ts -m -o build
